hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Boing-oing!^There are times in life when one should seek the help of others...^Thus, when standing alone fails to help, stand together.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Slingshot#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Center Bombable Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Saria's House#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #3# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Zora Scale#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Dodongo's Cavern#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Carpenters' tent#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: Hey! Wait! Don't go out! It's unsafe!^Wild Pokémon live in tall grass!^You need your own Pokémon for your protection.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Nayru's Love# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a spider high #above the icy waters# holds #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #the Minuet of Forest# and #the Iron Boots#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of time.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Hover Boots#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Falling Ceiling Room Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of time.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say only one heart piece in all of Hyrule will declare the holder a winner.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Bottle# and #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Small Key# and #a Deku Stick#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.
